website_summaries.verdict: A unique twist on a round dining room table that has an unmistakably modern flair.
pros: Offers an appealing combination of a round glass top with hexagonal-shaped open metal base
cons: Glass is fragile enough to break with some force

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It was easy to assemble and it’s the most beautiful table I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Ivanna Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t wait to get this table. It’s so elegant and was very, very, did I say very easy to assemble. Can’t wait to host a dinner party with family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Laraine

customer_reviews.title: glass table
customer_reviews.text: It is glass so keeping it clean will be the bulk of the maintenance but it looks great in my kitchen. It matches the rest of the decor theme of my house and it's sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald

customer_reviews.title: hate this table/ worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for, I underestimated the size and that is completely my fault. With that being said, the table shakes if u even so much as breath on it. really light, which is nice but not when it never stands in one spot, because 1 slight touch and it moves. very unhappy with this purchase and mad at myself for not returning it on time.
customer_reviews.author: greg bukhgalter

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't believe the price!
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was too good to be true---a great table for such an inexpensive price. I was amazed at the quality and the accurate description. If you like the design of this piece---think no more--BUY it. It's as described and a STEAL of a deal. Another great thing about it is that the glass top screws into the table frame, so you don't have to worry about it staying centered, straight, or being knocked off.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Simply Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this table as you can see I have it all decked out in turquoise black with my dishes the chairs came from another place. This table was simple to put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is very nice...
customer_reviews.text: I can't complain about this table at all. I paid 176.00 plus tax and I'm pretty impressed with what I received. I have had tables double and triple this price so with that being said this table was a steal. I read a review that said the table moves when u bump into it and that is just not the case. Maybe they have uneven floors lol. The base is sturdy and the glass is pretty heavy for being an under 200 dollar table. I love the chrome look because most of my furniture has a chrome finish so it fits in quite well with my decor. I'm really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bling Queen 👑

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Table appears black tint however I got a clear glass. I’m sure my order said black tint glass. It’s ok I love it anyways. Instructions were terrible. It mentioned each things with letters but the bolts and stuff were not labeled so I had to figure it out on my own. Some things didn’t line up so I needed another person to stretch out the legs while I screw them in. Table is a decent thickness in the glass so it’s a pretty good quality and the base is pretty sturdy. It’s slightly on the heavier side so it’s definitely a”bang for your buck” I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I assembled it alone..it was easy to do and I absolutely am happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Delicate yet sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was weary about this table as some people had an issue with its sturdiness but upon receiving the item I realized that this may be because of the way you screw it the bolts. With each leg, you have to hand screw the 2 bolts and the same time until you cannot anymore and then use the Allen wrench but make sure you are doing the same amount of turns to each because that’s how the length can start to be thrown off. Other than this, the table is absolutely beautiful and perfect for my apartment. In case you need a reference to the height: I am 5’2 and the table is just below butt level.
customer_reviews.author: Kasandra Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the cost of this table. The glass is so heavy and well made. Well packaging. No damages. Only suggestion (not necessarily bad) regarding quality of the legs material - could be improved in terms of weight, chrome paint, hollowness, fabrication, etc. I know no one will kneel down to look for imperfections, but you definitely see them when you assemble the table. But with such price, I overlooked this.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Defective table and poor customer service of the seller
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately one of the table components (metallic pin) has a defect and I couldn't put on one table leg. I tried to reach out to the seller directly but they're not responding via phone or chat. So I have to return the table. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: The table is much smaller than in the description it is 52x28 in. The description states that it is 55x32 and it is further confirmed by the drawing in the images. Too painful to box it up and send it back. I'll keep it for a while then move on, but very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Liang

customer_reviews.title: Pretty table
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for this table. It really looks nice and was easy to assemble. Unfortunately, the box came a bit dented and the glass table top has a large scratch across the top about 8 inches long. I was worried that it being glass, something like this might happen. Otherwise, I would give it a 5 star rating. I'm keeping it because I'm moving and returning it would be a total hassle.
customer_reviews.author: DRod

customer_reviews.title: Scratched glass
customer_reviews.text: We got the base put together and we go to put the glass on and there is 6 inch area that is completely scratched up. We obviously don’t want to have to take this apart and then repackage and buy another so we will now have to spend extra money on finding something to take the scratches out. It’s a really cool looking table, but there’s obviously some flaws when you get something “new” and it’s all scratches up.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Schlessman

customer_reviews.title: as depicted
customer_reviews.text: it was easy to put together. its beautiful and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: bbinct

customer_reviews.title: Super flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I had to. This table looks good but it’s very flimsy. It’s not even screwed in. It stays together with a glue. If I didn’t put it together I would totally return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kler Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price , would recommend !
customer_reviews.text: • Easy to put together, great for the price. • Bigger than expected, absolutely love it. • Would definitely recommend, very very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Armani

customer_reviews.title: Classy yet Glamorous
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table!!! It adds a touch of glamour to my apartment. I would recommend. I assembled it myself it took 30-45 mins MAX and that’s because I was nervous and reading directions carefully . It’s travelled with me from my old apartment to the new one and the only thing I had to do was remove 3 screws so I could secure the glass . Reassembling it was super easy took me 5 mins. Really cute ! Sturdy !! Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. Easy to assemble and looks amazing. It is much larger than I thought it was. Very sturdy and just a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: S.Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice! It’s a little narrow. You can’t put a center pice if you use 2 chargers under a plate on the short side.
customer_reviews.author: Aye Cee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Used for 6 months already
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. Looks beautiful. Be careful with the top, it's not scratch proof. Got many compliments :)
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Just like the picture and looks really good against my blue wall in my dining area ! This table can easily seat 4 people. I would recommend purchasing this glass dining room table for condos or small apartments !
customer_reviews.author: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the way 😢
customer_reviews.text: Came completely broke 😢 I’m soooooo sad! I was excited with this table! 😭😭😭
customer_reviews.author: lucas

customer_reviews.title: Love the table, not loving the Amazon support.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice table and a great value for the money. My only frustration was a very small dent in one of the legs and the Amazon rep could not get me one replacement leg with the table model number. He kept insisting there's a serial number for this table which there is not. So I'm left on my own to try to get it figured out. Love the table, not real happy with the Amazon experience
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: It is so pretty! The only flaw was their was rust on a few of the railings but once I assembled it, it hid that. Other than that it was super easy to assemble. I did it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tarnesha

customer_reviews.title: Glam!
customer_reviews.text: This table is super cute! New guests compliment this every time the come in simple elegant and glam. There’s a set of living room tables that are a perfect match!
customer_reviews.author: Gomez

customer_reviews.title: SO EASY TO PUT TOGETHER
customer_reviews.text: Table came sooner then I expected, it was by far the most easiest and fastest thing I put together in my life. It literally took me 10 minutes to put this table together. The glass top was extremely heavy so it took 2 people to lift that up. Overall Im proud of my purchase and amazon for me never seems to disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Mya Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Loovvvee it
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this table . Didn’t notice it was for Ashley furniture til it was delivered. It arrived early. Easy to put together. Packaging a few scraps & Bumps. Lol but the item don’t have any flaws .
customer_reviews.author: mylasia

customer_reviews.title: It fits 5 comfortably and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for 2, however I have had 5 people sitting and having a formal dinner with no issue at all. I love the craftsmanship and it is so sturdy. It add a special flair and sophistication to my space.
customer_reviews.author: Liriye Prodani

customer_reviews.title: Best $72 i ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when it was $72 and it was worth every buck! Nothing bad to say so far
customer_reviews.author: ElleRenee

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping the base had a little more width. Overpriced for the stability
customer_reviews.author: Caroline pugh

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my table beautiful put together in less than 10 min.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Love this table...
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect table for my small dining arwa.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Gail M. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: My wife love it, easy to assemble, chairs fit perfect, more space, makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table Im in love. So elegant for the price
customer_reviews.author: Tamika

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love it!!! Perfect for a kitchen dining table
customer_reviews.author: jennz89

customer_reviews.title: Great as a desk!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I use it for a desk, couldn't find one I liked so I ordered this table. PLENTY of room for working on my laptop, could easily accommodate two full size monitors. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if it weren’t damaged upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured and good value for money but unfortunately came with a chip in one corner of the glass top.
customer_reviews.author: KSavage

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quality Glass Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is exactly as it appears in the product photo. It’s easy to assemble and comes with assembly tools. Not only is it beautiful, but it’s very sturdy and the glass is thick. I love it and I’m so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Loved how pretty it is but its not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Torres

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The table is smaller than I thought it would be, but honestly it’s the perfect size for my dining area. I love the glass with silver. Very bougie lol. Now I’m on the hunt for the perfect chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Pinkie

customer_reviews.title: One of my best purchases on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table. It is simple and elegant and fit perfectly in my dining area. Super super easy to assemble too.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: A bit defective
customer_reviews.text: Two of the legs had a dent but other wise its nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came shattered
customer_reviews.text: My table came completely shattered. I was beyond upset. The minute I opened the box glass poured out.
customer_reviews.author: Ysamar

customer_reviews.title: Simple Elegance
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, great for small spaces, simple elegance and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So nice and perfect for my house The only problem I have it’s that’s it’s so easy to slide But at the moment everything it’s fine making my House look
customer_reviews.author: Yuliana y Josue

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! It’s a very steady table and it’s secure. The glass is very resistance and size is perfect for a small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: romina

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT arrive assembled
customer_reviews.text: Love it, put it together fairly easily but description states it comes assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: Item was completely damaged!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the package I noticed the glass table was broken!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Table
customer_reviews.text: The table is larger than expected and I really like it. It was inexpensive but looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Qutrina Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: The table is very sturdy and modern. Definitely was worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Marian Evans

customer_reviews.title: The quality of it.
customer_reviews.text: I love love my set. It looks very high end and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute
customer_reviews.text: A little shorter than I wanted but overall we get so many compliments on it
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough a 8 month pregnant woman can do it
customer_reviews.text: I love it, easy to put together and I’m 8 months pregnant lol
customer_reviews.author: Shy Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Glass and metal, clean look.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table, very easy to assemble. Sturdy and cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Table
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assembly and looks perfect in my new place
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

product_meta.title: Signature Design by Ashley Madanere Dining Room Table, Chrome Finish
product_meta.description: Size:RoundWowing with an open and airy but sturdy profile, the Madanere round dining room table is sure to whet your appetite for ultra-contemporary style. Sporting a chrome-tone finish for a high-sheen effect, the hexagonal metal base is striking from every angle. Clear glass top rounds out the look with sheer simplicity.
feature_bullets: GLASS DINING TABLE: Helping yourself to clean-lined, contemporary style is simple with this stylish table. The chrome tone accentuates the mod look for top notch presentation
HANDSOMELY CRAFTED: Made with a metal frame in a chrome tone finish and a clear, tempered glass top with a beveled edge
CHIC ACCENTS: Fashioned in a trendy, open design, the hexagonal base and glass top are sure to exude high style at the dinner table
SEATING FOR 4: Invite friends or family to gather around for a dinner party or a lazy breakfast in the kitchen on Sunday. This table measures 48" W x 48" D x 30" H
ARRIVES ASSEMBLED: Ready for instant enjoyment. Matching dining room chairs available, sold separately
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars183 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
